document.full_text: milwaukee pitcher zack greinke won his fifth consecutive decision to lead the milwaukee brewers to a four-game sweep of the florida marlins with a 7-2 victory on monday.
document.title: brewers' zack greinke stays sharp in win over marlins
lines_and_colors: milwaukee pitcher zack greinke won his fifth consecutive decision to lead the milwaukee brewers to a four-game sweep of the florida marlins with a 7-2 victory on monday.
